A company scanned Apple cables compared to cheaper knock off’s

Chris
07 Jan 2025

Check out the full report USB-C head-to-head comparison

But just look at the photos

This is one reason Apple gets a reputation for being more “expensive” but you can’t tell me those are the same cables. You really do get what you pay for here in both speed and longer term reliability. Job’s famously said “Apple doesn’t know how to make junk” and despite a few missteps here and there, this seems true. When it comes to technology the devils in the details and Apple does detail better than anyone. I’m sure they have good margin on these, of course. But it’s not the highway robbery people think it is.
